`	B-X
SYS	B-X
`	B-X
command	B-X
is	B-X
not	B-X
a	B-X
valid	B-X
command	B-X
in	B-X
PowerShell	B-X
.	B-X
.	B-X
To	B-X
get	B-X
the	B-X
current	B-X
system	B-X
information	B-X
in	B-X
PowerShell	B-X
,	B-X
you	B-X
can	B-X
use	B-X
the	B-X
`	B-X
Get	B-X
-	B-X
SystemInformation	B-X
`	B-X
cmdlet	B-X
.	B-X
This	B-X
cmdlet	B-X
provides	B-X
a	B-X
lot	B-X
of	B-X
information	B-X
about	B-X
the	B-X
system	B-X
,	B-X
including	B-X
the	B-X
operating	B-X
system	B-X
,	B-X
hardware	B-X
,	B-X
and	B-X
software	B-X
configuration	B-X
.	B-X
.	B-X
Here	B-X
is	B-X
an	B-X
example	B-X
of	B-X
how	B-X
to	B-X
use	B-X
the	B-X
`	B-X
Get	B-X
-	B-X
SystemInformation	B-X
`	B-X
cmdlet	B-X
:	B-X
.	B-X
`	B-X
`	B-X
`	B-X
.	B-X
PS	B-X
C	B-X
:	B-X
\	B-X
>	B-X

Why	B-X
mini	B-X
-	B-X
DP	B-X
instead	B-X
of	B-X
Thunderbolt	B-X
3	B-X
:	B-X
A	B-X
Comparative	B-X
Analysis	B-X
.	B-X
Mini	B-X
-	B-X
DP	B-X
(	B-X
Mini	B-X
DisplayPort	B-X
)	B-X
and	B-X
Thunderbolt	B-X
3	B-X
are	B-X
both	B-X
high	B-X
-	B-X
speed	B-X
connectors	B-X
used	B-X
for	B-X
transferring	B-X
data	B-X
and	B-X
power	B-X
between	B-X
devices	B-X
.	B-X
While	B-X
Thunderbolt	B-X
3	B-X
has	B-X
gained	B-X
popularity	B-X
in	B-X
recent	B-X
years	B-X
,	B-X
mini	B-X
-	B-X
DP	B-X
remains	B-X
a	B-X
viable	B-X
alternative	B-X
for	B-X
several	B-X
reasons	B-X
.	B-X
.	B-X
Firstly	B-X
,	B-X
mini	B-X
-	B-X
DP	B-X
is	B-X
a	B-X
more	B-X
versatile	B-X
connector	B-X
than	B-X
Thunderbolt	B-X
3	B-X
.	B-X
It	B-X
can	B-X
be	B-X
used	B-X
for	B-X
both	B-X
display	B-X
and	B-X
data	B-X
transfer	B-X
,	B-X
whereas	B-X
Thunderbolt	B-X
3	B-X
is	B-X
primarily	B-X
designed	B-X
for	B-X
data	B-X
transfer	B-X
only	B-X
.	B-X
This	B-X
makes	B-X
mini	B-X
-	B-X
DP	B-X
a	B-X
more	B-X
convenient	B-X
option	B-X
for	B-X
users	B-X
who	B-X
need	B-X
to	B-X
connect	B-X
multiple	B-X
devices	B-X
to	B-X
a	B-X
single	B-X
port	B-X
.	B-X
.	B-X
Secondly	B-X
,	B-X
mini	B-X
-	B-X
